net.kuujo.vertigo.io.connection

Interface ConnectionOutputBatch

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Closeable<OutputConnection>, Connection<OutputConnection>, Openable<OutputConnection>, Output<OutputConnection>, OutputConnection, OutputGroupSupport<OutputConnection>

    public interface ConnectionOutputBatch
extends OutputConnection
    Connection level output batch.

    The connection output batch is an extension of the OutputConnection that allows batch connections to be selected during routing.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
